slide.text: "This command sets the button’s name. Let’s review all of its sections."
"The command starts with the type of View we’re working on, a Button."
"myButton is the name we have chosen to assign to this specific Button."
"In parnethesis we write this Button’s ID from the Design screen, with a prefix of ’R.id.’."
""Now let’s take a look at these two commands: first we choose a name for the Button whos’ text we want to change, and then we define the new text for it.""
